table.name: work_invoice
table.description: Includes a record of driver activities for a shipment. This is the record sent to payroll and used to calculate driver pay.

columns.name: WORK_INVOICE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the work invoice.

columns.name: WORK_INVOICE_XID
columns.description: The XID for the work invoice.

columns.name: WORK_INVOICE_NUMBER
columns.description: The GID for the work invoice from a business standpoint; if a corrected work invoice is generated, this number will be retained.

columns.name: DRIVER_GID
columns.description: The GID of the driver for this work invoice.

columns.name: SECONDARY_DRIVER_GID
columns.description: If driven by a team, the secondary driver ID.

columns.name: DATE_SENT
columns.description: Date this work invoice was sent to payroll.

columns.name: REVENUE_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The XID for the revenue currency.

columns.name: REVENUE_BASE
columns.description: Revenue in the base unit of measure currency.

columns.name: MARKED_FOR_PURGE
columns.description: Indicates this record can be purged as part of the next purge run.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.
